duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead all aspects of product development and drive innovation for the organization.
Partner with CEO/Founder and marketing to develop rolling 3-year innovation pipeline, identify new product concepts, and drive innovation.
Create and manage product briefs for new products, conduct competitive analysis, and research new ingredients, textures, products, and packaging.
Identify and manage new formulators/contract manufacturers, track formula development, and ensure formula approvals are achieved on time.
Develop storytelling for products, manage clinical testing requirements, and ensure compliance within various markets.
Attend industry events, trade shows, and supplier meetings to stay abreast of current trends and technologies, bring innovation and new ingredients to the forefront of the product ideation process.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS required, strong understanding of chemistry as it pertains to skincare ingredients.
